text: It Was I Who Drew the Little Man () is a 1960 Soviet animated movie directed by Valentina Brumberg, Zinaida Brumberg and Valentin Lalayants.ЧЕЛОВЕЧКА НАРИСОВАЛ Я (1960)Человечка нарисовал я (1960) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1960 movies Category:1960s animated movies Category:Soviet animated movies
title: It Was I Who Drew the Little Man
